successes.title: Omate TrueSmart: Water-resistant standalone Smartwatch 2.0
successes.description: Omate® TrueSmart™ truly standalone water-resistant smartwatch, works independently from and with all smartphones. 3G, Voice & Gestures!

Pledges.description: Every supporter, every effort counts - Support us - thanks! We'll show our appreciation with your very own Kickstarter-only Limited Edition Keychain made from the Omate TrueSmart PCB Board - Geek is the new Chic!
TrueSmart Tshirt - Black or White. See Update #18 for Tshirt Design. Great for Daily wear, Geek-Chic wear, Hip-smart wear > Be TrueSmart.
Omate TrueSmart EARLY BIRD SPECIAL #1 | Step in right now as the fastest supporter of Omate TrueSmart. Thank you for your fast action!

Omate TrueSmart EARLY BIRD SPECIAL #2 |
Missed the Early Bird Special #1? Don't miss this #2, support us now!

Omate TrueSmart STANDARD Edition | 
Be an innovator, world's first new generation Smartwatch 2.0, works standalone, as companion to your smartphones or as smart wearable phone for your smart wearables eg. Google Glass
Omate TrueSmart DEVELOPERS Edition | First delivery in OCTOBER before anyone else! Limited first 2000 units serial numbered, SDK, Developers Forum, Developers Support, ships Rooted

Omate TrueSmart DEVELOPERS Edition | Same package as Standard Edition + SDK, Developers Forum, Developers Support, ships Rooted // By popular demand, extra Developers Packages for those who missed the earlier ones, hurry don't miss it again.

MERRY CHRISTMAS Personalised Edition | 
Omate TrueSmart in Merry Christmas & Happy New Year Packaging + PERSONALISED Message on the back of the watch (Up to 12 characters). Great for Company name (Company Gift), Your Name, Loved One's Name, "Forever Love" and more!
Omate TrueSmart 1Gb/8Gb Edition | with 1Gb memory / 8Gb on-board storage. Backers of this pledge reward can choose to have STANDARD or DEVELOPERS in the Survey at the end of the Campaign
